Class Highway

java.lang.Object
Highway
public class Highway extends Object
This class manages the highway in which the gameplay is occuring.

  • Method Details

    • checkLose

      public void checkLose(Vehicle vehicle, int i)
      method which vallidates the lose condition.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - accepts the player's vehicle as an object of the class Vehicle.
      i - accepts the player's current index position on the highway as an integer.

    • checkWin

      public boolean checkWin(int i, int highwayLength)
      Method which validates the win condition.
      Parameters:
      i - accepts the player's current index position on the highway as an integer.
      highwayLength - accepts the length of the highway as an integer.
      Returns:
      the validation result as a boolean value.

    • createHighway

      public char[][] createHighway(int highwayLength)
      Method that creates a highway.
      Parameters:
      highwayLength - accepts the length of the highway as an integer.
      Returns:
      the highway map as a two dimensional array.

    • displayMenu

      public void displayMenu()
      Method which displays the menu during gameplay.

    • displayHighway

      public void displayHighway(char[][] theHighway, int a)
      Method which displays the highway during gameplay.
      Parameters:
      theHighway - accepts the highway as a two dimensional array of characters.
      a - accepts the variable as an integer which limits the display of the highway to only 10 sections.

    • setHighwayLength

      public int setHighwayLength(String difficultyLevel)
      Method which generates the length of the highway according to the difficulty level selected by the player.
      Parameters:
      difficultyLevel - accepts the selected difficulty level as a String.
      Returns:
      a randomly generated length of the highway as an integer.

    • setObstacles

      public void setObstacles(char[][] theHighway, int highwayLength, String difficultyLevel)
      Method that places obstacles on the highway map.
      Parameters:
      theHighway - accepts the highway as a two dimensional array of characters.
      highwayLength - accepts the length of the highway as an integer.
      difficultyLevel - accepts the difficulty level as a String.

    • traverseHighway

      public void traverseHighway(char[][] theHighway, int highwayLength, String difficultyLevel, Vehicle vehicle)
      Method which facilitates the dynamics of the highway during the gameplay.
      Parameters:
      theHighway - accepts the highway as a two dimensional array of characters.
      highwayLength - accepts the length of the highway as an integer.
      difficultyLevel - accepts the difficulty level as a String.
      vehicle - accepts the player's vehicle of choice as an object of the class Vehicle.
